name: vidnavigator
description: AI-powered video search, analysis, and transcription for YouTube and social media videos
long_description: VidNavigator provides advanced AI-powered capabilities for searching, analyzing, and transcribing videos from YouTube and social media platforms. Features include semantic video search with AI ranking, comprehensive video analysis with summaries and Q&A, transcript extraction, and transcription of non-YouTube videos from Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and more. Perfect for content creators, researchers, and developers who need to understand video content at scale.

tools.name: get_video_transcript
